title: West Loop Luxury Apartments
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Beautiful one bed apartment in a luxury complex. Located conveniently between downtown chicago and the west loop. Easy access to highways and public transportation.  Amenities in the building include : Pool  Doorman Fitness center Conference room Move in concierge  Dog park just outside  Pet friendly and more…  Photos are of model unit Pricing subject to change  I’m a apartment locator over multiple buildings in the west loop with studios-3beds ranging from $1700-7000. Leasing terms 6-14months If this one isn’t a fit I definitely have options
